project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers should be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Implement the main game loop to ask questions and gather user input
Create a variable to store questions and multiple-choice answers
Calculate and track the user's score based on answers
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for the game functionality, ensuring questions and scoring work correctly
Execute tests on the implemented game features to ensure functionality
